forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 41F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers this evening, mainly cloudy late with periods of rain or snow. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers early, with occasional rain, possibly mixed with snow after midnight. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Thunder possible. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Remaining cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers of rain and wet snow in the morning. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with steady light freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming light freezing rain later at night. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning...changing to all rain. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of rain and freezing rain early...changing to all rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
